verses.verse: For as much<WG1895> as many<WG4183> have taken<WG2021> in hand<WG2021> to set<WG392> forth<WG392> in order<WG1299> a declaration<WG1335> of those<WG3588> things<WG4229> which are most surely<WG4135> believed<WG4135> among<WG1722> us,
Even<WG2531> as they delivered<WG3860> them to us, which<WG3588> from the beginning<WG746> were eyewitnesses,<WG845> and ministers<WG5257> of the word;<WG3056>

It seemed<WG1380> good to me also,<WG2504> having had perfect<WG199> understanding<WG3877> of all<WG3956> things from the very first,<WG509> to write<WG1125> to you in order,<WG2517> most<WG2903> excellent<WG2903> Theophilus,<WG2321>
That you might know<WG1921> the certainty<WG803> of those things,<WG3056> wherein<WG4012> <WG3739> you have been instructed.<WG2727>

THERE was in the days<WG2250> of Herod,<WG2264> the king<WG935> of Judaea,<WG2449> a certain<WG5100> priest<WG2409> named<WG3686> Zacharias,<WG2197> of the course<WG2183> of Abia:<WG7> and his wife<WG1135> was of the daughters<WG2364> of Aaron,<WG2> and her name<WG3686> was Elisabeth.<WG1665>
And they were both<WG297> righteous<WG1342> before<WG1799> God,<WG2316> walking<WG4198> in all<WG3956> the commandments<WG1785> and ordinances<WG1345> of the Lord<WG2962> blameless.<WG273>
And they had<WG1510> no<WG3756> child,<WG5043> because<WG2530> that Elisabeth<WG1665> was barren,<WG4723> and they both<WG297> were now well<WG4260> stricken<WG4260> in years.<WG2250>
And it came<WG1096> to pass, that while<WG1722> <WG3588> he executed<WG2407> the priest's<WG2407> office<WG2407> before<WG1725> God<WG2316> in the order<WG5010> of his course,<WG2183>

According<WG2596> to the custom<WG1485> of the priest's<WG2405> office,<WG2405> his lot<WG2975> was to burn<WG2370> incense<WG2370> when he went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the temple<WG3485> of the Lord.<WG2962>
And the whole<WG3956> multitude<WG4128> of the people<WG2992> were praying<WG4336> without<WG1854> at the time<WG5610> of incense.<WG2368>
And there appeared<WG3700> to him an angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> standing<WG2476> on<WG1537> the right<WG1188> side<WG1188> of the altar<WG2379> of incense.<WG2368>
And when Zacharias<WG2197> saw<WG1492> him, he was troubled,<WG5015> and fear<WG5401> fell<WG1968> on him.

But the angel<WG32> said<WG2036> to him, Fear<WG5399> not, Zacharias:<WG2197> for your prayer<WG1162> is heard;<WG1522> and your wife<WG1135> Elisabeth<WG1665> shall bear<WG1080> you a son,<WG5207> and you shall call<WG2564> his name<WG3686> John.<WG2491>
And you shall have<WG2071> joy<WG5479> and gladness;<WG20> and many<WG4183> shall rejoice<WG5463> at<WG1909> his birth.<WG1083>

For he shall be great<WG3173> in the sight<WG1799> of the Lord,<WG2962> and shall drink<WG4095> neither<WG3756> <WG3361> wine<WG3631> nor<WG2532> strong<WG4608> drink;<WG4608> and he shall be filled<WG4130> with the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> even<WG2089> from his mother's<WG3384> womb.<WG2836>
And many<WG4183> of the children<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474> shall he turn<WG1994> to the Lord<WG2962> their God.<WG2316>

And he shall go<WG4281> before<WG1799> him in the spirit<WG4151> and power<WG1411> of Elias,<WG2243> to turn<WG1994> the hearts<WG2588> of the fathers<WG3962> to the children,<WG5043> and the disobedient<WG545> to the wisdom<WG5428> of the just;<WG1342> to make<WG2090> ready<WG2090> a people<WG2992> prepared<WG2680> for the Lord.<WG2962>

And Zacharias<WG2197> said<WG2036> to the angel,<WG32> Whereby<WG2596> <WG5101> shall I know<WG1097> this?<WG5124> for I am an old<WG4246> man, and my wife<WG1135> well<WG4260> stricken<WG4260> in years.<WG2250>

And the angel<WG32> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> to him, I am<WG1510> Gabriel,<WG1043> that stand<WG3936> in the presence<WG1799> of God;<WG2316> and am sent<WG649> to speak<WG2980> to you, and to show<WG2097> you these<WG5023> glad<WG2097> tidings.<WG2097>

And, behold,<WG2400> you shall be dumb,<WG4623> and not able<WG1410> to speak,<WG2980> until<WG891> the day<WG2250> that these<WG5023> things shall be performed,<WG1096> because<WG473> <WG3759> you believe<WG4100> not my words,<WG3056> which<WG3748> shall be fulfilled<WG4137> in their season.<WG2540>
And the people<WG2992> waited<WG4328> for Zacharias,<WG2197> and marveled<WG2296> that he tarried<WG5549> so long in the temple.<WG3485>

And when he came<WG1831> out, he could<WG1410> not speak<WG2980> to them: and they perceived<WG1921> that he had seen<WG3708> a vision<WG3701> in the temple:<WG3485> for he beckoned<WG1269> to them, and remained<WG1265> speechless.<WG2974>
And it came<WG1096> to pass, that, as soon as the days<WG2250> of his ministration<WG3009> were accomplished,<WG4130> he departed<WG565> to his own house.<WG3624>
And after<WG3326> those<WG5025> days<WG2250> his wife<WG1135> Elisabeth<WG1665> conceived,<WG4815> and hid<WG4032> herself<WG1438> five<WG4002> months,<WG3376> saying,<WG3004>
Thus<WG3779> has the Lord<WG2962> dealt<WG4160> with me in the days<WG2250> wherein<WG3739> he looked<WG1896> on<WG1896> me, to take<WG851> away<WG851> my reproach<WG3681> among<WG1722> men.<WG444>
And in the sixth<WG1623> month<WG3376> the angel<WG32> Gabriel<WG1043> was sent<WG649> from God<WG2316> to a city<WG4172> of Galilee,<WG1056> named<WG3686> Nazareth,<WG3478>
To a virgin<WG3933> espoused<WG3423> to a man<WG435> whose<WG3739> name<WG3686> was Joseph,<WG2501> of the house<WG3624> of David;<WG1138> and the virgin's<WG3933> name<WG3686> was Mary.<WG3137>
And the angel<WG32> came<WG1525> in to her, and said,<WG2036> Hail,<WG5463> you that are highly favored,<WG5487> the Lord<WG2962> is with you: blessed<WG2127> are you among<WG1722> women.<WG1135>
And when she saw<WG1492> him, she was troubled<WG1298> at<WG1909> his saying,<WG3056> and cast<WG1260> in her mind what<WG4217> manner<WG4217> of salutation<WG783> this<WG3778> should be.
And the angel<WG32> said<WG2036> to her, Fear<WG5399> not, Mary:<WG3137> for you have found<WG2147> favor<WG5485> with God.<WG2316>
And, behold,<WG2400> you shall conceive<WG4815> in your womb,<WG1064> and bring<WG5088> forth<WG5088> a son,<WG5207> and shall call<WG2564> his name<WG3686> JESUS.<WG2424>

He shall be great,<WG3173> and shall be called<WG2564> the Son<WG5207> of the Highest:<WG5310> and the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> shall give<WG1325> to him the throne<WG2362> of his father<WG3962> David:<WG1138>
And he shall reign<WG936> over<WG1909> the house<WG3624> of Jacob<WG2384> for ever;<WG165> and of his kingdom<WG932> there shall be no<WG3756> end.<WG5056>
Then<WG1161> said<WG2036> Mary<WG3137> to the angel,<WG32> How<WG4459> shall this<WG5124> be, seeing<WG1893> I know<WG1097> not a man?<WG435>

And the angel<WG32> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to her, The Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> shall come<WG1904> on you, and the power<WG1411> of the Highest<WG5310> shall overshadow<WG1982> you: therefore<WG1352> also<WG2532> that holy<WG40> thing which shall be born<WG1080> of you shall be called<WG2564> the Son<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

And, behold,<WG2400> your cousin<WG4773> Elisabeth,<WG1665> she has also<WG2532> conceived<WG4815> a son<WG5207> in her old<WG1094> age: and this<WG3778> is the sixth<WG1623> month<WG3376> with her, who<WG3588> was called<WG2564> barren.<WG4723>
For with God<WG2316> nothing<WG3756> shall be impossible.<WG101>
And Mary<WG3137> said,<WG2036> Behold<WG2400> the handmaid<WG1399> of the Lord;<WG2962> be it to me according<WG2596> to your word.<WG4487> And the angel<WG32> departed<WG565> from her.
And Mary<WG3137> arose<WG450> in those<WG5025> days,<WG2250> and went<WG4198> into<WG1519> the hill<WG3714> country with haste,<WG4710> into<WG1519> a city<WG4172> of Juda;<WG2448>
And entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3624> of Zacharias,<WG2197> and saluted<WG782> Elisabeth.<WG1665>

And it came<WG1096> to pass, that, when<WG5613> Elisabeth<WG1665> heard<WG191> the salutation<WG783> of Mary,<WG3137> the babe<WG1025> leaped<WG4640> in her womb;<WG2836> and Elisabeth<WG1665> was filled<WG4130> with the Holy<WG40> Ghost:<WG4151>
And she spoke<WG400> out with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> and said,<WG2036> Blessed<WG2127> are you among<WG1722> women,<WG1135> and blessed<WG2127> is the fruit<WG2590> of your womb.<WG2836>
And what<WG4159> is this<WG5124> to me, that the mother<WG3384> of my Lord<WG2962> should come<WG2064> to me?
For, see,<WG2400> as soon as the voice<WG5456> of your salutation<WG783> sounded<WG1096> in my<WG3450> ears,<WG3775> the babe<WG1025> leaped<WG4640> in my womb<WG2836> for joy.<WG20>
And blessed<WG3107> is she that believed:<WG4100> for there shall be a performance<WG5050> of those<WG3588> things which were told<WG2980> her from the Lord.<WG2962>
And Mary<WG3137> said,<WG2036> My soul<WG5590> does magnify<WG3170> the Lord,<WG2962>
And my spirit<WG4151> has rejoiced<WG21> in God<WG2316> my Savior.<WG4990>
For he has regarded<WG1914> the low<WG5014> estate of his handmaiden:<WG1399> for, behold,<WG2400> from now on<WG3568> all<WG3956> generations<WG1074> shall call<WG3106> me blessed.<WG3106>
For he that is mighty<WG1415> has done<WG4160> to me great<WG3167> things; and holy<WG40> is his name.<WG3686>
And his mercy<WG1656> is on them that fear<WG5399> him from generation<WG1074> to generation.<WG1074>
He has showed<WG4160> strength<WG2904> with his arm;<WG1023> he has scattered<WG1287> the proud<WG5244> in the imagination<WG1271> of their hearts.<WG2588>
He has put<WG2507> down<WG2507> the mighty<WG1413> from their seats,<WG2362> and exalted<WG5312> them of low<WG5011> degree.<WG5011>
He has filled<WG1705> the hungry<WG3983> with good<WG18> things; and the rich<WG4147> he has sent<WG1821> empty<WG2756> away.<WG1821>
He has helped<WG482> his servant<WG3816> Israel,<WG2474> in remembrance<WG3415> of his mercy;<WG1656>
As he spoke<WG2980> to our fathers,<WG3962> to Abraham,<WG11> and to his seed<WG4690> for ever.<WG165>
And Mary<WG3137> stayed<WG3306> with her about<WG5616> three<WG5140> months,<WG3376> and returned<WG5290> to her own house.<WG3624>
Now<WG1161> Elisabeth's<WG1665> full<WG4130> time<WG5550> came<WG4130> that she should be delivered;<WG5088> and she brought<WG1080> forth<WG1080> a son.<WG5207>
And her neighbors<WG4040> and her cousins<WG4773> heard<WG191> how<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> had showed<WG3170> great<WG3170> mercy<WG1656> on her; and they rejoiced<WG4796> with her.

And it came<WG1096> to pass, that on<WG1722> the eighth<WG3590> day<WG2250> they came<WG2064> to circumcise<WG4059> the child;<WG3813> and they called<WG2564> him Zacharias,<WG2197> after<WG1909> the name<WG3686> of his father.<WG3962>
And his mother<WG3384> answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> Not so; but he shall be called<WG2564> John.<WG2491>
And they said<WG2036> to her, There is none<WG3762> of your kindred<WG4772> that is called<WG2564> by this<WG5129> name.<WG3686>
And they made<WG1770> signs<WG1770> to his father,<WG3962> how<WG5101> he would<WG2309> have him called.<WG2564>
And he asked<WG154> for a writing<WG4093> table,<WG4093> and wrote,<WG1125> saying,<WG3004> His name<WG3686> is John.<WG2491> And they marveled<WG2296> all.<WG3956>
And his mouth<WG4750> was opened<WG455> immediately,<WG3916> and his tongue<WG1100> loosed, and he spoke,<WG2980> and praised<WG2127> God.<WG2316>

And fear<WG5401> came<WG1096> on<WG1909> all<WG3956> that dwelled<WG4039> round<WG4039> about them: and all<WG3956> these<WG5023> sayings<WG4487> were noised<WG1255> abroad<WG1255> throughout<WG1722> all<WG3650> the hill<WG3714> country of Judaea.<WG2449>

And all<WG3956> they that heard<WG191> them laid<WG5087> them up in their hearts,<WG2588> saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> <WG686> manner<WG686> of child<WG3813> shall this<WG5124> be! And the hand<WG5495> of the Lord<WG2962> was with him.
And his father<WG3962> Zacharias<WG2197> was filled<WG4130> with the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> and prophesied,<WG4395> saying,<WG3004>
Blessed<WG2128> be the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> of Israel;<WG2474> for he has visited<WG1980> and redeemed<WG4160> <WG3085> his people,<WG2992>
And has raised<WG1453> up an horn<WG2768> of salvation<WG4991> for us in the house<WG3624> of his servant<WG3816> David;<WG1138>
As he spoke<WG2980> by the mouth<WG4750> of his holy<WG40> prophets,<WG4396> which<WG3588> have been since<WG575> the world<WG165> began:
That we should be saved<WG4991> from our enemies,<WG2190> and from the hand<WG5495> of all<WG3956> that hate<WG3404> us;
To perform<WG4160> the mercy<WG1656> promised to our fathers,<WG3962> and to remember<WG3415> his holy<WG40> covenant;<WG1242>
The oath<WG3727> which<WG3739> he swore<WG3660> to our father<WG3962> Abraham,<WG11>
That he would grant<WG1325> to us, that we being delivered<WG4506> out of the hand<WG5495> of our enemies<WG2190> might serve<WG3000> him without<WG870> fear,<WG870>
In holiness<WG3742> and righteousness<WG1343> before<WG1799> him, all<WG3956> the days<WG2250> of our life.<WG2222>

And you, child,<WG3813> shall be called<WG2564> the prophet<WG4396> of the Highest:<WG5310> for you shall go<WG4313> before<WG4253> the face<WG4383> of the Lord<WG2962> to prepare<WG2090> his ways;<WG3598>
To give<WG1325> knowledge<WG1108> of salvation<WG4991> to his people<WG2992> by the remission<WG859> of their sins,<WG266>
Through<WG1223> the tender<WG4698> mercy<WG1656> of our God;<WG2316> whereby<WG1722> <WG3739> the dayspring<WG395> from on high<WG5311> has visited<WG1980> us,
To give<WG2014> light<WG2014> to them that sit<WG2521> in darkness<WG4655> and in the shadow<WG4639> of death,<WG2288> to guide<WG2720> our feet<WG4228> into<WG1519> the way<WG3598> of peace.<WG1515>
And the child<WG3813> grew,<WG837> and waxed<WG2901> strong<WG2901> in spirit,<WG4151> and was in the deserts<WG2048> till<WG2193> the day<WG2250> of his showing<WG323> to Israel.<WG2474>
